    • Method Detail

      • getItemById

        public Item getItemById(int id,
                        int type)
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the item which will be used to identify the item
        type - type of the item, 0== movie 1== tvshow
        Returns:
        returns the item with ID of id and instance of type else it returns null

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item item)
        Method to add a new item to the list
        Parameters:
        item - The item that is being added to the list

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        Returns the size of the Item list

      • getItem

        public Item getItem(java.lang.String title)
        Parameters:
        title - The item's title that we use in the search
        Returns:
        Returns the item if the title was found in the list, else it returns null

      • get

        public ArrayList<Item> get()
        Returns:
        Returns the Item List with all elements inside
